profileAlternative.name: Matt Goswell
profileAlternative.headline: Technical Product Marketing Manager at Microsoft focused on Power BI, Analysis Services and SQL Server BI
profileAlternative.summary:
Power BI, Analysis Services and SQL Server Business Intelligence Technical Product Manager.
Focused on enabling enterprise information management, data modeling and business intelligence with Power BI, Analysis Services and SQL Server BI.
Highly skilled in traditional, modern and hybrid data warehousing implementations.
Enterprise Information Management guidance and implementation (hybrid, on-premises and cloud)
Multiple Data Source Management and Integration.
Hybrid cloud architecture and implementation.
Enterprise SQL Server Architect & Storage Consultant.
SQL Server Consolidation & Virtualisation Consultant.
Microsoft Infrastructure Architect.
Business Recovery Consultant.
Disaster Recovery Consultant.
Windows 7 MCITP \ MCTS.
DCSM (Digital\Compaq VMS).
HP-CSP-EVA (HP EVA Storage Professional).
ITIL Framework v1\2.
Specialties: Data Warehousing and Business Intelligence architecture, support & consultancy (all versions & editions), platform integration & implementation (including PaaS, scale-out, HA\DR\BC), performance optimisation & troubleshooting, deployment, best practice, SQL Server virtualisation & consolidation expert.
Storage and fabric design, performance review, capacity & cost analysis. Disaster Recovery design, planning, testing and implementation. Infrastructure design. Windows 7. ITIL. TOGAF, Zachman, TEAF framework familiarity.

positions.title: Microsoft
positions.description:
Develop and execute go-to-market, including differentiated value proposition, marketing content and scenario-based product demonstrations that showcase PowerBI and Microsoft's broader business analytics portfolio.
Foster close and productive collaboration with engineering teams around product capabilities, value proposition and differentiation.
Drive product launches and field readiness.
Drive development of core product BOM including training, tools and demos (including keynote level) to support the Go-To-Market strategy through the Microsoft field and partners.
Thought Leadership - drive industry and customer perception via participation in analyst relations, direct customer & partner engagement, Industry events and broad community outreach including blog, web and user groups.
Readiness and Enablement - drive readiness and enablement of the Microsoft and Partner technical communities.
Depth Customer Engagement - support the field and partners in sales and marketing activities to drive adoption. Capture customer feedback and integrate into product planning process.
Compete – Maintain deep subject matter expertise and synthesize insights on customers and competition
Support disclosure strategies in partnership with business planning and communications/AR/PR. Work with integrated marketing, press relations and analyst relations teams to ensure breadth & depth coverage.
…
see more

roles.title: Technical Product Marketing Manager (Power BI and SQL Server BI incuding Azure Analysis Services)

positions.title:
Title
Data Warehousing and Information Management Technical Product Manager
positions.description:
- Contribute into the strategic and technical direction and adoption of Information Management capabilities.
- Enable internal and external customers to understand and implement Microsoft's enterprise data warehousing, data management and information management solutions.
- Thought Leadership - drive industry and customer perception via participation in analyst relations, direct customer & partner engagement, Industry events and broad community outreach (social, web, etc.).
- Core Technical Content- Drive the development of core product training, tools and demos (including keynote level) to support the business strategy through the field and Microsoft partners.
- Technical Readiness and Enablement - drive technical readiness and enablement of the wider Microsoft and Partner technical communities across Data Warehousing and Information Management.
- Depth Customer Engagement - support the field and partners in sales and marketing activities to drive adoption of data orientated solutions.
- 360 degree Feedback management - Capture customer feedback and integrate into product planning process.
- Technical Compete - analyze our position (SWOT) relative to key competitors through combination of competitive research and product teardowns.
- Drive displacement - Influence and develop competitive materials for partners and the field, and define/manage competitive escalation process.


…

positions.title:
Title
Solution Architect (PDW & APS (EMEA) Worldwide Centre of Excellence)
positions.description: Solution Architect working within the SQL Server PDW & Appliance Worldwide Centre of Excellence. Specialising in SQL Server Parallel Data Warehouse, Data Warehousing & Infrastructure Integration and emerging Big Data technologies.

roles.title: Solution Architect (PDW & APS (EMEA) Worldwide Centre of Excellence)

positions.title: SQL Server Infrastructure & Database Consultant
positions.description:
CSC Engagement:
Design the SQL Server infrastructure required to support a custom application database. The database requires designing and testing with new data interfaces within the business. An XML interface standard will be formalised to support future reporting and data lifecycle management requirements.
…
see more

positions.title: Microsoft Infrastructure Architect
positions.description:
Microsoft Infrastructure Architect specialising in performant, robust, reliable and resilient designs for the SQL Server, Enterprise storage and data availability landscapes.
Working across all business and industry sectors.

positions.title: SQL Server Platform Architect
positions.description:
CSC Engagement:
Provide SQL Server architecture to address multiple SQL Server 2008 R2 clusters which are required to support document management and MII application databases.

positions.title: Solutions Architect
positions.description:
CSC Engagement:
Various projects undertaken on behalf of the account including various application reviews, a Rugged PC requirement for the shop floor, Lotus Notes storage migration, VMWare farm expansion, Blackberry service migration, New HQ infrastrcutuer architecture and Data Centre planning & architecture for infrastcrure services including power.
…
see more

given.text: Matt is the Go-To guy for Microsoft SQL Server - IMO he is Ranger or Black Belt or MVP quality - highly reccomended.

Matt is one of the finest Sql Server experts I have had the pleasure to work with aka Level 500 right up to Sales. Going beyond that he has depth and breadth across infrastructure solutions and is very well placed as a Trusted Advisor for any Large Account that would wish to seek his guidance for service transformation and improvement.

Matt is one of those people you work with in you're career who you look back on and say, that guy had it totally wired! Unbelievable product knowledge, excellent communication skills and a fantastic attitude, Matt is definately someone you want on board for any project whether of a SQL or infrastructure nature. His work on the Freshfields consolidation POC was of the highest calibre, and yet he welcomed challenges to the design and indeed many brainstorming sessions were held between us in this regard. By all accounts then Matt is very near the top of his profession and also with a cracking sense of humour, I would definately work with Matt again.
…
See more

Matt was the first employee at DSP that I had the pleasure of being introduced to. He was also the first to send me an email welcoming me to the company which I really appreciated. Matt has to be one of the most friendliest people I have worked with, not to mention his level of knowledge and expertise in Microsoft technologies, which helped me immensely in understand Microsoft from a commercial perspective. I always remember Matt as someone that people always turned to, whether it was a question about Microsoft, Storage or any other technology - his passion for technology is unrivaled. I can remember interrupting Matt umpteenth times during busy periods and he would never complain, put aside what he was doing and willing to assist with any any query I had and this wasn’t just limited to me, he would readily help anybody in the company. Without hesitation, Matt comes highly recommended. Directions to the post office please…that will be £2 sir :)
…
See more

Matt is without doubt in the top 1 percent of MS SQL consultants I have had the pleasure to work with over the last ten years. I have had the pleasure of working in most of the UK’s top 10 investment banks and believe you will have to go a way to find a person with a such high caliber of technical expertise. Approaching Matt with a major problem only prompts an equally adequate solution and as such I would highly recommend him for any MS SQL related work or project globally.
…
See more

If I needed an upfront, honest answer about a specific issue I spoke to Matt. He has always cut through the smoke and mirrors and got to the point of what works now and what we need to revisit at a later date. Matt helped me in many service/business critical situations and was always ready to go the extra mile - everytime. I would highly recommend Matt's skills, competency, commitment and especially his loyalty. That is Matt...............
…
See more

Matt is a delight to work with, he is a true professional with a keen eye for detail. I would recommend Matt to all future employers, he is a great motivator with unlimited enthusiasm. An expert in his field who is not afraid to challenge new ideas.

received.text: DJ is a fantastic business partner who can execute across the entire technology stack. DJ and his team are outstanding; a highly technical and capable team who can mobilize at short notice and go 'above and beyond' to deliver exceptional solutions, assets and collateral. I highly recommend DJ and his Third Eye team, they are one of the best teams I have had the pleasure of working with.

Claus is an impressive business partner with exceptional planning and execution capacity,  supported by a good understanding of technology. I partnered with Claus on various GTM's and partner motions which were all successful because of Claus' due diligence and transparent execution. I highly recommend Claus aas a loyal, trustworthy and incredibly capable member or leader of any sized team. Claus can execute at any level which is very impressive, I cannot recommend Claus high enough.
